trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex*> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex*> property for navigation in wizard controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <> </> *> propriedade e o <> </> *> propriedade de navegação em controles de assistente.

trans-unit.source: The WizardNavigationEventArgs class provides the data needed for the various navigation events in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe WizardNavigationEventArgs fornece os dados necessários para os diversos eventos de navegação em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control uses the WizardNavigationEventArgs object to indicate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>controle usa o objeto WizardNavigationEventArgs para indicar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A>para o controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that is currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> objeto exibido no momento o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> do objeto que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controle será exibido ao lado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the navigation to the next step in the wizard should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a navegação para a próxima etapa no assistente deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigation to the next step should be canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a navegação para a próxima etapa deve ser cancelada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> objeto exibido no momento o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that is currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice de base zero que representa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> objeto exibido no momento o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> do objeto que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controle será exibido ao lado.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice de base zero que representa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> do objeto que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controle será exibido ao lado.
